addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.details: Only callable by a policy admin. The policy must not be cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy.
params.subscriber: The address to add to the policy subscription.

createCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4,uin.details: Associates the calling function with the specified policy ID and parameter types.

params.callingFunctionName: the name of the calling function (to be stored in metadata)
params.encodedValues: the string representation of the values encoded with the calling function (to be stored in metadata)
params.functionSignature: The function signature of the calling function.
params.pTypes: The parameter types for the calling function.
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

returns._0: functionId The index of the created calling function.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.details: Builds a foreign call structure and maps it to the associated policy ID.

params._foreignCall: The definition of the foreign call to create.
params._policyId: The policy ID the foreign call will be mapped to.

returns._0: The index of the created foreign call.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bool,u.details: Creates a new tracker and associates it with the specified policy ID.

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._0: trackerIndex The index of the created tracker.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bool,u.details: Creates a new tracker and associates it with the specified policy ID and assigns the tracker to addresses.

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

returns._0: trackerIndex The index of the created tracker.

deleteCallingFunction(uint256,uint256).details: Removes the calling function and its associated rules and mappings.

params.callingFunctionId: The ID of the calling function to delete.
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to delete.
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).details: Helper function to store tracker data

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params.trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to store

params.policyId: The policy ID the calling functions are associated with.

returns._0: CallingFunctionStorageSet An array of calling function data.

getAllForeignCalls(uint256).details: Retrieve Foreign Call Set from storage

params.policyId: the policy Id of the foreign call to retrieve
The policy ID the trackers are associated with.

returns._0: trackers An array of tracker data.

params.callingFunctionId: The ID of the calling function to retrieve.
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

params.callingFunctionId: The identifier for the calling function
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

returns._0: the metadata for the calling function

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to retrieve.
params.policyId: The policy ID of the foreign call to retrieve.

params.foreignCallId: The identifier for the foreign call
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

returns.fcMeta: the metadata for the foreign call

params.index: The index of the tracker to retrieve.
params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.

params.index: The index of the tracker to retrieve.
params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
The ID of the policy.
params.subscriber: The address to check for policy subscription.

returns._0: bool True if the address is a subscriber, false otherwise.

removeClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,add.details: Only callable by a policy admin. The policy must not be cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy.
params.subscriber: The address to remove from the policy subscription.

updateCallingFunction(uint256,uint256,by.details: Ensures that the new parameter types are compatible with the existing ones.

params.callingFunctionID: The ID of the calling function to update.
params.functionSignature: The function signature of the calling function.
params.pTypes: The new parameter types to append.
params.policyId: The policy ID the calling function is associated with.

returns._0: functionId The updated calling function ID.

params.foreignCallId: The ID of the foreign call to update.
params.policyId: The policy ID the foreign call is associated with.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.details: Modifies the tracker associated with the specified policy ID and tracker index.

params.policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params.trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to update.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.details: Modifies the tracker associated with the specified policy ID and tracker index.

params._policyId: The policy ID the tracker is associated with.
params._trackerIndex: The index of the tracker to update.
params._trackerKey: The keys for the tracker mapping.
params._trackerValue: The values for the tracker mapping.

addClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,addres.notice: Adds an address to the subscriber list of a specified policy.

createCallingFunction(uint256,bytes4,uin.notice: Creates a new calling function and stores it in the calling function storage mapping.

createForeignCall(uint256,(bool,address,.notice: Creates a foreign call and stores it in the contract's storage.

createTracker(uint256,(bool,uint8,bool,u.notice: Adds a tracker to the tracker storage mapping.
Adds a mapped tracker to tracker storage.

deleteCallingFunction(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a calling function from storage.

deleteForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Deletes a foreign call from the contract's storage.

deleteTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Tracker mappings are not deleted, since trackerIds are not reused that data will never clash with new trackers.

getAllCallingFunctions(uint256).notice: Retrieves all calling functions associated with a specific policy ID.

getAllTrackers(uint256).notice: Retrieves all trackers associated with a specific policy ID.

getCallingFunction(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a calling function from storage.

getForeignCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a foreign call from the contract's storage.

getMappedTrackerValue(uint256,uint256,by.notice: Retrieves a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

getTracker(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves a tracker from the tracker storage mapping.

isClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,address.notice: Checks if an address is a subscriber of the specified policy.

removeClosedPolicySubscriber(uint256,add.notice: Removes an address from the subscriber list of a specified policy.

updateCallingFunction(uint256,uint256,by.notice: Updates an existing calling function by appending new parameter types.

updateForeignCall(uint256,uint256,(bool,.notice: Updates a foreign call in the contract's storage.

updateTracker(uint256,uint256,(bool,uint.notice: Updates an existing tracker in the tracker storage mapping.
Updates an existing tracker in the tracker storage mapping.
